Articles.Content:
Since my other challenge on heavy lift vehicles seemed popular, I figured I'd make another. This one's on space planes.

The Challenge:

Build a space plane, boost it into stable orbit, and use the plane to de-orbit and land at KSC.

The Rules:


  • [li]The orbit must go around at least 2 times to prove it is stable[/li]
    [li]The landing site must be within sight of the Kerbal Space Center[/li]
    [li]The kerbonauts must survive landing from the plane. Powered assists are allowed, but no parachutes.[/li]

The Details:

You can use any plane mod you want, I suggest the C-7 pack though as it's very well made.

You can use any other addons you want as well. List them in your post though.

Add some screenshots of the ship, the orbit, and the landing. Video is also allowed.

Please post .craft files so other people can fly your ships! Good luck!
Haven't got time for 2 orbits tonight, will do it tomorrow morning. Should be easy.
